title: Owning a Property
body: When you first buy a property, limited space will be buildable. The more roommates you get, the more you can upgrade the buildable space without penalty. Additionally, you'll want to set yourself a property category on the lot page. Each property category has different benefits for the hosts and the visitors - you'll be able to find more information on these in the Help window. You should review it before making a decision, as the category cannot be changed for a week after it is set!
